amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike $1 million in funding for the `Restore Good Fellow Lodge, Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore' and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in part C of House Report 111-184 to strike $1 million in funding for the `Restore Good Fellow Lodge, Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore' and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 305 (Roll no. 470).
